properties.name: _Vermont Republic
properties.note:
Vermont Republic (1783-09-03)

1783/09/03 -> 1791/03/03

Vermont declared its independence from New York in 1777. Although not recognized as a separate state by the Continental Congress, Vermont functioned as an independent republic until statehood in 1791. Map depicts Vermont boundaries as of 3 Sep 1783.

(Slade, 70-73; Van Zandt, 64; Williamson, C., 82-84, map facing 95, 100-102, 112-113)
